author: dantraMSFT
body:
With SxS use of PowerShell, it's difficult to filter events for a specific version of PowerShell  (commitid).
the change would extend each template definition to include the commit id of the originating PowerShell.

Ideally, this would be done in the PSEtwLogProvider.EventWrite method to avoid changing all callers.
title: Update ETW events to include the GIT commit id in the payload.
